description:
Officer Yamasato Futoshi, who has been assigned to a police box in Beika City starting this month, comes to the Mori Detective Agency. There was a dine and dash at a Beika City restaurant, and a similar incident occurred in Haido City where he was previously stationed. It was allegedly a blonde woman in sunglasses who looked like idol group DDPP`s Kakurai Kayoko...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 笑顔を消したアイドル
